articles.author: Mary Ann Azevedo
articles.title: Accel doubles down on 1Password, which just raised $100M more at a $2B valuation
articles.description: The previously bootstrapped 1Password raised its first round of external capital in 2019, a $200 million Series A led by Accel that represented the VC firm’s largest single investment in its 35 years.
articles.content:
Toronto-based 1Password is one of those rare companies that is a) profitable and b) transparent enough to share financials.
And today, the company announced that it raised $100 million in a Series B… [+5077 chars]

articles.author: James Wagner
articles.title: Blue Jays Cleared for Return to Canada
articles.description: The team has been granted an exception to resume play in Toronto on July 30, with restrictions in place to help prevent coronavirus outbreaks.

articles.title: Wimbledon, and British Tennis Fans, See a Rising Star in Emma Raducanu
articles.description: The teenager, a wild-card entry, delighted and surprised in the tournament’s first week. She is part of a growing trend of young women who are showing that experience isn’t everything.
